alert.note: Alert for Park; Sweet Grass; Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued June 12 at 3:55PM MDT until June 13 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE AMERICAN FORK BURN AREA REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding, rock slides and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall are possible over the American Fork Burn Area. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Wheatland. In south central Montana, Park and Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall over the American Fork Burn Area is expected up to and during the period of the watch. Be sure to stay up to date with information from local authorities. Heavy rainfall could trigger flash flooding of low-lying areas, rock slides, and debris flows in and downstream of the American Fork burn scar. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - National Weather Service Meteorologists are forecasting heavy rainfall over the burn scar, which may lead to flash flooding and debris flows. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
